main event: A civilian reported a sighting of a large oval object hovering about 30 feet above the ground in Liberty Center, Ohio on January 6, 1966.
interesting points: The object was about the size of a house,The observer noticed the object was roughly a quarter of a mile away,The sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes before the object suddenly went down and touched the ground,The object became completely out of sight within a minute,There were no photographs associated with this sighting.
